thread.title: England fan strips completely NAKED and parties in the stands during international friendly game with Germany
thread.title_full: England fan strips completely NAKED and parties in the stands during international friendly game with Germany

author: Jake Polden
title: England fan strips completely NAKED and parties in the stands during international friendly game with Germany
text:
England fan strips completely NAKED and parties in the stands during international friendly game with Germany Well, it's not like it's cold or anything, is it? Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Naked England fan dances during Germany Vs England Share this video Get daily     
England are playing Germany in an international friendly. 
Yes, it's two nations with a lot of history and a very big rivalry, but it's still a friendly. 
Plus the first half passed without incident what with the two teams going into the changing rooms with XI men and no goals between them. 
So how do you keep yourself entertained while watching from the stands? Well, you strip naked of course, don't you? Seems the obvious thing to do to us... Not something you see everyday (Photo: Twitter/footyawayday) The other England fans love it (Photo: Twitter/footyawayday) 
And apparently to this England fan as well, who did exactly that while watching the match at Dortmund's Westfalenstadion. 
Now when we say naked, we should be clear, we mean NAKED. 
No, he didn't take his top off and wave it over his head, nor did he prance around in his underpants. What on earth have I just seen!? (Photo: REUTERS) I can't concentrate! (Photo: REUTERS) 
He stripped off completely and danced about for the other supporters, all of whom couldn't believe what they were seeing. 
Whether the man is still in the stands remains to be seen. 
We're guessing stewards would have likely turfed him out, or at least ordered him to put his clothes back on, had they spotted him. Like us on Facebook
